Uses of Package
org.robolectric.shadows

  • Packages that use org.robolectric.shadows 
    Package Description
    org.robolectric  
    org.robolectric.internal  
    org.robolectric.shadows
    Provides shadow implementations of classes in the Android SDK.
    org.robolectric.tester.org.apache.http

    ShadowHandler
    Shadow for Handler that puts posted Runnables into a queue instead of sending them to be handled on a separate thread.Runnables that are scheduled to be executed immediately can be triggered by calling ShadowHandler.idleMainLooper().
    ShadowHandlerThread 
    ShadowHttpResponseCache 
    ShadowImageView

    ShadowIntentSender 
    ShadowIntentService 
    ShadowItemizedOverlay
    Shadow for ItemizedOverlay that keeps track of what has been called and enables the return value for ShadowItemizedOverlay.hitTest(com.google.android.maps.OverlayItem, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable, int, int) to be set up by tests.

    ShadowLocation
    Shadow of Location that treats it primarily as a data-holder todo: support Location's static utility methods
    ShadowLocationManager
    Shadow of LocationManager that provides for the simulation of different location providers being enabled and disabled.
    ShadowLog 
    ShadowLooper
    Shadow for Looper that enqueues posted Runnables to be run (on this thread) later.
    ShadowMapActivity
    Shadow MapActivity that registers and unregisters a BroadcastReceiver when ShadowMapActivity.onResume() and ShadowMapActivity.onPause() are called respectively.
    ShadowMapController
    A Shadow of MapController that tracks its own state and keeps the state of the MapView it controlls up to date.
    ShadowMapView
    Shadow of MapView that simulates the internal state of a MapView.
    ShadowMatrix 
    ShadowMediaMetadataRetriever

    Shadows the MediaRecorder class.
    ShadowMediaScannerConnection 
    ShadowMediaStore 
    ShadowMediaStore.ShadowImages 
    ShadowMediaStore.ShadowImages.ShadowMedia 
    ShadowMenuInflater
    Shadow of MenuInflater that actually inflates menus into Views that are functional enough to support testing.
    ShadowMessenger 
    ShadowMimeTypeMap
    Shadow for MimeTypeMap that allows custom extension <-> mimetype mapping to be set up by tests.
    ShadowMotionEvent
    Shadow for MotionEvent that uses reflection to create MotionEvent objects, which cannot otherwise be constructed.
    ShadowNetworkInfo
    Shadow of NetworkInfo which is used by ShadowConnectivityManager.

    ShadowPaint
    Shadow of Paint that has some extra accessors so that tests can tell whether a Paint object was created with the expected parameters.
    ShadowParcel 
    ShadowParcelFileDescriptor 
    ShadowPath
    Shadow of Path that contains a simplified implementation of the original class that only supports straight-line Paths.

    Shadow of PendingIntent that creates and sends Intents appropriately.
